comments:
Build M9

Trying to perform a clean rebuild of the entire (source) self-hosting workspace 
(autobuild off), I observed that the build dialog refused to close and transfer 
to build progress. Found the following in the log after several attempts to 
close it (it finally closed after hammering the close button a dozen times).

Widget is disposed

Interestingly when the log entry got dumped in console (-consoleLog), an error 
dialog opened, reading something cryptic like: "error open blocked dialog" (but 
I did not notice it at this stage). The full build was running though in 
parallel, since in the meantime the build progress had appeared and I had sent 
it to the background (leaving the error dialog open).

Once build finished, I noticed the error dialog and close it. Another full 
build got triggered !?!

busyCursorWhile was not locking out shells other than windows. Fixed in builds 
>20040526
*** Bug 63215 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
